mapper.insert: insert into user_coupons(user_id, coupon_id, status, create_time) values(#{userId}, #{couponId}, 0, now())
mapper.update: update user_coupons set status = #{status}, used_order_id = #{orderId}, used_time = CASE WHEN #{status} = 1 THEN now() ELSE used_time END where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select count(1) from user_coupons where user_id = #{userId} and coupon_id = #{couponId}
